bill_title: establish certain requirements regarding extended warranties for motor vehicles.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain requirements regarding extended warranties for motor vehicles. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. No insurance policy providing an extended warranty for a motor vehicle may be offered in this state that contains a provision terminating the extended warranty upon the transfer of the ownership of the motor vehicle. Section 2. No vehicle service contract providing an extended warranty for a motor vehicle may be offered in this state that contains a provision terminating the extended warranty upon the transfer of the ownership of the motor vehicle. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.016 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to establish certain requirements regarding extended warranties for motor vehicles. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Notwithstanding the provisions of § 58-1-3, no insurance policy providing an extended warranty for a motor vehicle may be offered in this state that contains a provision terminating the extended warranty upon the transfer of the ownership of the motor vehicle. Section 2. Notwithstanding the provisions of § 58-1-3, no vehicle service contract providing an extended warranty for a motor vehicle may be offered in this state that contains a provision terminating the extended warranty upon the transfer of the ownership of the motor vehicle. BILL HISTORY 1/25/99 First read in Senate and referred to Transportation. S.J. 180 2/2/99 Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date. 2/2/99 Transportation Do Pass Amended, Passed, AYES 4, NAYS 2. S.J. 297
